Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2010 12:02AM familymatters2 wrote: Could you send me the pattern/kit for an apron?  My mom will be having BMX on 1/29 and I would appreciate anything that could help ease this difficult time for her.  What a God send all of you ladies are on these boards....my dad went through kidney cancer this past year and now mom is going thru BC and upcoming surgery....I'm a nurse but never did my oncology courses or clinicals prepare me for what my parents have and are going thru like what I have been able to learn from you ladies on this site.  Thanks to all of you for being so open and sharing.  I would love to be able to share this pattern with other ladies I know going thru their own similiar experiences and also with the Cancer Ctr where mom is plugged into.  Thanks!
Posts.Title: Do you need a mastec/recon apron? HairSprayMom HairSprayMom
